Uses of Class
monq.jfa.Dfa

  • Packages that use Dfa 
    Package Description
    monq.jfa
    Implements Finite Automata, deterministic and nondeterministic, with an engine for high throughput filtering of text.
    monq.jfa.actions
    contains general purpose classes to be used as callbacks in finite automata created with package monq.jfa.
    monq.programs
    a collection of command line programs.

    • Uses of Dfa in monq.jfa

      Fields in monq.jfa declared as Dfa 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Dfa Xml.DFA_AttValue
      a Dfa which matches a Xml.AttValue.
      static Dfa Xml.DFA_Eq
      a Dfa which matches a Xml.Eq.
      static Dfa Xml.DFA_Name
      a Dfa which matches a Xml.Name.
      static Dfa Xml.DFA_S
      a Dfa which matches a Xml.S.
      Methods in monq.jfa that return Dfa 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dfa Nfa.compile(DfaRun.FailedMatchBehaviour fmb)
      compiles this into a Dfa with the given behaviour for non-matching input.
      Dfa Nfa.compile(DfaRun.FailedMatchBehaviour fmb, FaAction eofAction)
      compiles this non-deterministic finite automaton into a deterministic finite automaton.
      Dfa DfaRun.getDfa()
      returns the Dfa operated by this.
      static Dfa Misc.wrapRoi(java.lang.CharSequence reStart, FaAction startAction, DfaRun.FailedMatchBehaviour inRoi, java.lang.CharSequence reEnd, FaAction endAction, DfaRun.FailedMatchBehaviour outsideRoi, Nfa client)
      wraps a Nfa into another one which defines a region of interest (ROI).
      Methods in monq.jfa with parameters of type Dfa 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Statistics Statistics.getStatistics(Dfa dfa, java.io.Writer w)
      same as Statistics.getStatistics(Nfa,Writer) but for a Dfa.
      void DfaRun.setDfa(Dfa dfa)
      changes the Dfa to run.
      Constructors in monq.jfa with parameters of type Dfa 
      Constructor and Description
      DfaRun(Dfa dfa)
      creates a DfaRun with empty initial input.
      DfaRun(Dfa dfa, CharSource in)
      creates a DfaRun object to operate the given Dfa.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
